column4: na ntsɛmbuafo rubua hɔn atsɛn a; ɔno wombu ɔtseneneenyi no bem

column3: sɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi no sɛ hwe a
column6: dodow dɛ mbrɛ no bɔn no tse."

column3: mma ɔmmbor: ɔno bɛyɛ na sɛ ɔbor
column4: na ɔhwe no mbaa pii sen iyi a
column5: wo nua no adan w'enyi do ɔhorohoraanyi."

column2: "Mma nnkata ɔnantwi ano aber a oritsia ewu."

column5: mma owufo no ne yer nnkɔ ehuw mu nnkɔwar ɔhɔho: no kun no no nua na ɔnkɔ ne nkyɛn
column6: na ɔmfa no nyɛ ne yer
column7: na ɔnyɛ okun no nua asɛdze no mma no."

column3: abakan a ɔbɔwo no no nhyɛ no nua a oewu no ne dzin ananmu
column4: na ne dzin aammpepa emmfi Israel."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin no mmpɛ dɛ ɔfa no nua yer no a
column3: ɔno no nua ne yer no nkɔ mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ kuropon no ano
column5: Mo kun no nua pow dɛ ɔma dzin do ma no nua wɔ Israel
column6: ɔmmpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ kun no nua asɛdze no ma me."

column2: "Ɔno no kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfrɛ no
column3: na wɔnkasa nkyerɛ no: na sɛ ogyina hɔ

column2: "ɔno no nua ne yer no mbra ne nkyɛn wɔ mpanyimfo no enyim
column3: onyi banyin no n'ananadze mpaboa na onhima n'enyi do ntafi; na ɔnse dɛ
column4: Dɛm na wɔnyɛ ɔbanyin a ɔnnkyekyer no nua ne fi."

column2: "Na wɔmfrɛ ne dzin wɔ Israel dɛ
column3: Nyia ne mpaboa efi n'ananadze no ne fi."
na ɔbaako ne yer twe bɛn dɛ ɔrebɛgye no kun efi nyia ɔrohwe no ne nsamu
column4: na basia no tsen ne nsa suo banyin kor no ne banyin mu a:"

column2: "Mma nnya wo foto mu abrambo ahorow
"Mma nnya wo fi mu esusudze ahorow
"Abrambo kwan mu a ɔtsen na nya; esusudze kwan mu a ɔtsen na nya: na wo nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do."
"Na hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba nyinara
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ dza ɔmmfa kwan mu nyinara
column4: yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Kaa dza Amalek dze yɛɛ wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu aber a hom fi Egypt reba no;"
"mbrɛ osii behyiaa wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu
column4: hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ w'ekyir nyinara
column5: aber a atɔ bahaw na aberɛ; na oennsuro Nyankopɔn."

column3: sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ma wo ahomgye fi w'atamfo a woetwa wo ho ehyia nyinara nsamu wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa yɛ egyapadze no do a
column4: pepa Amalek nkaa fi ɔsor ase; mma wo werɛ mmfir."
